verses.verse: Praise <WH1984> the Lord! <WH3050> I will give <WH3034> thanks <WH3034> to the Lord <WH3068> with all <WH3605> [my] heart, <WH3824> In the company <WH5475> of the upright <WH3477> and in the assembly. <WH5712>
Great <WH1419> are the works <WH4639> of the Lord; <WH3068> [They are] studied <WH1875> by all <WH3605> who delight <WH2655> in them.
Splendid <WH1935> and majestic <WH1926> is His work; <WH6467> And His righteousness <WH6666> endures <WH5975> forever. <WH5703>
He has made <WH6213> His wonders <WH6381> to be remembered; <WH2143> The Lord <WH3068> is gracious <WH2587> and compassionate. <WH7349>
He has given <WH5414> food <WH2964> to those who fear <WH3372> Him; He will remember <WH2142> His covenant <WH1285> forever. <WH5769>
He has made <WH5046> known <WH5046> to His people <WH5971> the power <WH3581> of His works, <WH4639> In giving <WH5414> them the heritage <WH5159> of the nations. <WH1471>
The works <WH4639> of His hands <WH3027> are truth <WH571> and justice; <WH4941> All <WH3605> His precepts <WH6490> are sure. <WH539>
They are upheld <WH5564> forever <WH5703> and ever; <WH5769> They are performed <WH6213> in truth <WH571> and uprightness. <WH3477>
He has sent <WH7971> redemption <WH6304> to His people; <WH5971> He has ordained <WH6680> His covenant <WH1285> forever; <WH5769> Holy <WH6918> and awesome <WH3372> is His name. <WH8034>

The fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH3068> is the beginning <WH7225> of wisdom; <WH2451> A good <WH2896> understanding <WH7922> have all <WH3605> those who do <WH6213> [His commandments]; His praise <WH8416> endures <WH5975> forever. <WH5703>
